data.text:
Puja Sharma represents and advises employers in all aspects of labor and employment law, including defending companies in employment litigation such as wage and hour, discrimination, and unfair competition cases. She has experience with both class and collective actions in state and federal court.

Puja has handled every phase of litigation from inception through trial and appeal, as well as alternative dispute resolution such as arbitration and mediation, and settlement conferences. She has significant experience defending claims in the construction, hospitality, retail, healthcare, and nonprofit industries, among others.
